---
title: "SPARRA"
---

This Quarto book is a demo of the SPARRA package.

First, we load the package from the local directory.

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
install.packages("../minisparra/", repos = NULL, type="source")
library(miniSPARRA01)
```

-----

```{r}
make_raw_ae2() %>%
  clean_ae2() %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

```{r}
make_raw_ae2() %>%
  clean_ae2_jl() %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
